sect1.para: The following lists some of the many ways to obtain NetBSD on CD-ROM. If you offer one and would like it to be listed here, contact us.
The latest official release is NetBSD 2.0, announced on December 9, 2004. One can also obtain older formal releases of NetBSD, as well as snapshots of the -current development tree.

sect3.title: 2.0 - AllLinuxCD
sect3.para: AllLinuxCD carries a two CD version of NetBSD 2.0. They ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0.2 - BSD-Systems.co.uk
sect3.para: BSD-Systems.co.uk ships NetBSD/i386 2.0.2, NetBSD/amd64 2.0.2 and NetBSD/Sparc/Sparc64 worldwide. By purchasing a NetBSD CD from BSD-Systems.co.uk, you are indirectly donating to the NetBSD Project to further development. On each CD sold, 50 pence (0.50) is donated back to the Project.

sect3.title: 2.0 - Kordula's Web Services, CDs and DVDs
sect3.para: Kordula's Web Services offers the latest NetBSD release 2.0 on CD as well as CD-ROM sets of the NetBSD 2.0 release for i386 architecture, which includes binaries, full source code and precompiled packages for many of the ports. Alternatively, they also offer the content of these sets on a single DVD+R.
Price: Eur. 15,00 / USD 15.00 plus shipping.
Kordula's Web Services also created a new NetBSD web forum (default language English) to support the NetBSD community.

sect3.title: 2.0 - Linux System Labs
sect3.para: Linux System Labs offers the NetBSD 2.0 release on CD. They're located in Australia, but will gladly ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0 - Techbits
sect3.para: in Australia sells NetBSD 2.0 Installation CDs for the i386 platform. Available as single discs with either install+source or install+packages, or both together in a 2-CD set. techbits happily ships worldwide.

sect3.title: 2.0 - Teknikal Soul
sect3.para: offers a 3 CD-ROM NetBSD 2.0 set for the i386 architecture.

sect3.title: 1.6.2 - CheapISO.com
sect3.para:
CheapISO.com Online Store distribute
NetBSD 1.6.2, shipping it worldwide.

sect3.title: 1.6.2 - LinuxDist
sect3.para: LinuxDist sells NetBSD installation CDs for i386 machines, and offers world-wide delivery.

sect3.title: 1.6.2 - Maxtux.co.uk
sect3.para: maxtux.co.uk sells a single i386 installation CD of NetBSD 1.6.2 and the i386 binary package 6-CD set of NetBSD 1.6.1.

sect3.title: 1.6.2 - Mensys BV
sect3.para: Mensys sells NetBSD 1.6.2 on CD-ROM, and offer several payment methods. The installation CD contains NetBSD for i386, macppc, sparc and sparc64 machines, as well as English and Dutch versions of the guide. They also offer a NetBSD package CD-ROM for i386 machines.

sect3.title: 1.6.2 - ULNX.com
sect3.para: ULNX.com sells NetBSD 1.6.2 and previous 1.6 releases.

sect3.title: 1.6.1 - BSD Mall: NetBSD 1.6.1 release CD
sect3.para: BSD Mall US and BSD Mall EU offer multi-boot 1.6.1 release CD. The CD-ROM contains full binary release for i386, macppc, sparc64, sparc, and source for all architectures. CD-ROM is bootable on all four architectures.

sect3.title: 1.6.1 - XPLinux NetBSD CDROMS
sect3.para: XPLinux sells NetBSD Release CDROMS for i386, packages, and the NetBSD Live CDROM.

sect3.title: 1.6 - Bob's Budget CDs for NetBSD
sect3.para: 1.6 CDs, 1.5.3 Release Sets (2 CDs) and -current snapshots for most ports for US$7.50/CD (or equivalent). Release CD sets include sources and binaries for all ports in the release. Snapshot CDs include sources and binaries for the requested port; HowTos, ReadMe files and misc user-contributed code, scripts and examples. Packages CDs are also available which include the currently available pre-built packages collection for the requested port. Special CDs are also available for Sun and Mac users including an "all NetBSD versions for mac68k", an "all-mac CD with both mac68k and macppc ports" and a Sparc/i386/mac68k/macppc -current snapshot CD.
For a complete list of available CDs, ordering instructions and payment options contact Bob Nestor.

sect3.title: 1.6 - BSD Mall: NetBSD release CDs
sect3.para: Daemon News has been selling NetBSD releases on shrink-wrapped CD sets since 1999. They are currently available at bsdmall.com and for resellers through Cylogistics. They will always have the current set. These include a 3rd "Live Filesystem" CD and are available on a subscription basis.
Daemon News uses the proceeds to promote NetBSD at trade conferences and subsidize the DN Print Magazine.

sect3.title: 1.6 - CheepLinux
sect3.para: CheepLinux offers a single binary installation CDROM or a pack of 7 CDROMs. Orders dispatch before 3:30PM on the same day and ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 1.6 - LINUXandBSD
sect3.para: LINUXandBSD is currently selling a 6-CD set of NetBSD 1.6 for i386 systems. Being located in the US they generally ship within 48 hours, world-wide. Current price is $9.99 plus shipping costs.

sect3.title: 1.6 - LinuxPickup
sect3.para: LinuxPickup - Your On-Line Linux & xBSD CD Distribution Source! LinuxPickup currently offers the latest NetBSD 1.6.1 (8-CD Set). LinuxPickup provides International Shipping and various Payment Options to ensure shopping is fast and simple.

sect3.title: 1.6 - Wasabi Systems
sect3.para: Wasabi Systems carries two editions of the NetBSD 1.6 release on CD-ROM. The Standard Edition contains bootable CDs for i386 PC, Alpha, DECstation, SPARC, Power Macintosh, and VAX platforms. The Deluxe Edition contains 6 CD-ROMs and over 3 GB of pre-compiled third party software for x86 PCs. They are available through the Wasabi Systems web site.

sect3.title: 1.5.3 - Cylogistics
sect3.para: Cylogistics is a distributor for the Daemon News 1.5.3 and Wasabi 1.5.2 NetBSD releases on CD-ROM, as well as other BSD products to resellers only. Cylogistics also promotes NetBSD at shows and events.

sect3.title: 1.5.1 - BSD Central
sect3.para: BSD Central produces a NetBSD 1.5.1 4 CD set containing release binaries for alpha, i386, macppc, pmax, sparc, sun3, sparc64 and vax. Included are the Install CD and 3 Package CD's. More information is available on the BSD Central web site at:
Price is US $19.95 plus shipping. They are also selling the Wasabi Systems 1.5.2 CD sets.

sect3.title: 1.5.1 - MCD2 Diffusion
sect3.para: MCD2 Diffusion distributes three different cd-sets of NetBSD 1.5.1.
MCD2 Diffusion offers next working day delivery for Metropolitan France. Delivery outside of France is available for an additional carriage cost.

sect3.title: 1.5 - NetBSD/i386 Firewall Project
sect3.para: The NetBSD/i386 firewall project now sells a CD version as well. The CD does not only contain the firewall distribution, but all the binaries and sources of the i386 port of NetBSD as well. There's also a 3-CD kit that contains the source code of almost all the packages in the package source tree.

sect3.title: Custom - Yong S. Yi: Release versions for all architectures
sect3.para: Yong S. Yi also produces custom CD's, including the release, binary packages, and documentation, for whatever architecture (or combination of architectures) is requested. Price is US $6.50, including shipping to any U.S. location.

sect3.title: Argentina - 1.6 - Silvio Riesco
sect3.para: We sell NetBSD in cheap CD-Roms (single u$s 1.59 by CD) and send to all Argentina and Latin America. Visit http://linux-cd.com.ar/netbsd/ or email linux-cd@wguia.com for more information.

sect3.title: Australia - 1.6.1 - lankum.com
sect3.para: lankum.com carries the NetBSD 1.6.1 multi-cd1 CD-R (i386, macppc, sparc, sparc64 and source) and also the NetBSD/i386 1.6 release 7-CD set. They serve mainly the Australian and New Zealand markets but do also ship worldwide.

sect3.title: Australia - 1.6.1 Linux Information Technology
sect3.para:
Linux Information Technology are currently selling NetBSD 1.6.1 for macppc and i386. At the moment, shipping is limited to Australia. They would be happy to provide other ports if requested.
Email: sales@linuxit.com.au Address: 271a South street Hilton WA, Australia Phone: (08) 9331 8051 Fax: (08) 6210 1710

sect3.title: Brazil - 1.6.2 - AtuaTech LinuxStore
sect3.para: AtuaTech LinuxStore in Brazil sells NetBSD 1.6.2 CD ROMs. For details and inquieries, please contact compras-atuatech@atuatech.com.br.

sect3.title: Bulgaria - 1.6 - CDforME.net (i386)
sect3.para: CDforME.net produces a set of four NetBSD/i386 1.6 CD-ROMs which include release binaries and packages for the i386 platform, for only 18.00 EURO (one Boot CD plus six pkg CDs) Shipping not included, and a single i386 installation CD for 3 EURO.

sect3.title: Canada - 1.6.1 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: CheapBytes produce a set of 9 NetBSD/i386 1.6.1 CD-ROMs which include release binaries and packages for the i386 platform, for US $24.99 plus shipping, and a single i386 installation CD for US $4.99.

sect3.title: Canada - 1.6 - Edmunds Enterprises (i386 only)
sect3.para: Edmunds Enterprises of America, Inc. produces NetBSD/i386 CDs (binary sets only). Their orders almost always ship within 24 hours of payment. Payment options include credit card (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX), mail order, or PayPal.

sect3.title: China - 2.0.2 - Freewares.cn
sect3.para: Linuxstore.Freewares.cn offers CDs of NetBSD 2.0.2 for x86, PowerPC and SPARC, shipping within China mainland. See for more details.

sect3.title: China - 1.6.2 - Linuxcity.com.cn
sect3.para: Linuxcity.com.cn offers CDs of NetBD 1.6.2 and 1.6.1 for i386, shipping within China mainland (not including Hongkong, Macao and Taiwan). See their site for more details.

sect3.title: Czech Republic - 2.0 - NetBSD.cz
sect3.para: NetBSD.cz offers NetBSD 2.0 on CD-R and DVD-R, including binary packages based upon pkgsrc-2004Q3.

sect3.title: France - 1.6.1 - Ikarios (i386alpha, macppc, sparc)
sect3.para: Ikarios offers NetBSD 1.6.1 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Germany/Europe - 2.0 Lehmanns Bookshop
sect3.para: German-based (and Europe-wide shipping) bookshop Lehmanns offers a NetBSD 2.0 4-CD-set.

The set contains bootable install media for NetBSD 2.0 on i386, macppc, sparc, sparc64, vax and he installation files for several other ports. A third CD contains a set of essential packages for i386. The complete source code (kernel, userland, X and pkgsrc) is available on the fourth CD.

sect3.title: Germany and EU - 1.6.2 - bsdiso - Software Service Ronald Brock
sect3.para: http://www.bsdiso.de/ offers 1.6.2 CD's for NetBSD/i386 as well as other platforms, shipping within the European Union from Germany.

sect3.title: Germany - 1.6.1 - ixsoft Softwareentwicklung
sect3.para: ixsoft Softwareentwicklung offers several 1.6.1 CD's for various platforms. See their site for more details.

sect3.title: Japan - 1.6 - Plat'Home: Release & Write Vol. 22
sect3.para: Plat'Home's Release & Write Vol. 22 NetBSD 1.6 is a 4 CD-ROM set. It containes source and binary distribution.
The set is made up as follows.

itemizedlist.listitem:
CD-ROM 1: NetBSD 1.6 binary distribution 1
dreamcast, hpcsh, i386, sparc, sparc64 and source. (Bootable for i386, sparc and sparc64(USB keyboard not work))

CD-ROM 2: NetBSD 1.6 binary distribution 2
alpha, amiga, atari, hp300, luna68k, mac68k, mvme68k, news68k, next68k, sun2, sun3, x68k. (Bootable for alpha)

CD-ROM 3: NetBSD 1.6 binary distribution 3
algor, arc, cobalt, evbmips, hpcmips, mipsco, newsmips, pmax, sbmips, sgimips, vax. (Bootable for pmax and vax. (not tested))

CD-ROM 4: NetBSD 1.6 binary distribution 4
arm, acorn26, acorn32, cats, evbarm, hpcarm, macppc, netwinder, prep, shark, sandpoint, walnut. (Bootable for macppc. (Requier OpenFirmware 3.0 and later))

sect3.para: Plat'Home currently does not accept orders from outside Japan.

sect3.title: Japan - 1.5.3 - Plat'Home
sect3.para: Plat'Home is distributing Wasabi's NetBSD 1.5.3 CD. See their website for details.

sect3.title: Japan - 1.5.2 - Plat'Home: Release & Write Vol. 20
sect3.para: Plat'Home's Release & Write Vol. 20 NetBSD 1.5.2 is a 2 CD-ROM set. It containes source and binary distribution.
The set is made up as follows.

itemizedlist.listitem:
CD-ROM 1: NetBSD 1.5.2 binary distribution 1
alpha, arc, cobalt, hpcmips, i386, pmax, sparc, sparc64, vax and source. (Bootable for alpha, i386 and sparc)

CD-ROM 2: NetBSD 1.5.2 binary distribution 2
amiga, arm32, atari, hp300, mac68k, macppc, mvme68k, news68k, next68k, sun3 and source. (Bootable for macppc (Requires OpenFirmware 3.0 or later))

sect3.para: Plat'Home currently does not accept orders from outside Japan.

sect3.title: Japan - 1.5.1 - Plat'Home: Release & Write Vol. 19
sect3.para: Plat'Home's Release & Write Vol. 19 NetBSD 1.5.1 is a 2 CD-ROM and 2 DVD-ROM set containing the complete NetBSD 1.5.1 source and binary distribution, pre-built packages, and distfiles.
The set is made up as follows.

itemizedlist.listitem:
CD-ROM 1: NetBSD 1.5.1 binary distribution 1
alpha, arc, cobalt, hpcmips, i386, pmax, sparc, sparc64, vax and source. (Bootable for alpha, i386 and sparc)

CD-ROM 2: NetBSD 1.5.1 binary distribution 2
amiga, arm32, atari, hp300, mac68k, macppc, mvme68k, news68k, next68k, sun3 and source. (Bootable for macppc (Requires OpenFirmware 3.0 or later))

DVD-ROM 2: NetBSD 1.5 distfiles and other
distfiles, packages (overflow), and CVS repository.

sect3.para: Plat'Home currently does not accept orders from outside Japan.

sect3.title: Japan - 1.5 - Plat'Home: Release & Write Vol. 17
sect3.para: Plat'Home's Release & Write Vol. 17 NetBSD 1.5 is a 2 CD-ROM and 2 DVD-ROM set containing the complete NetBSD 1.5 source and binary distribution, pre-built packages, and distfiles.
The set is made up as follows.

itemizedlist.listitem:
CD-ROM 1: NetBSD 1.5 binary distribution 1
alpha, arc, cobalt, hpcmips, i386, pmax, sparc, sparc64 and source. (Bootable for alpha, i386, sparc, sparc64)

CD-ROM 2: NetBSD 1.5 binary distribution 2
amiga, arm32, atari, hp300, mac68k, macppc, mvme68k, news68k, next68k, pc532, sun3, vax and source (Bootable for macppc (Requires OpenFirmware 3.0 or later))

sect3.para: Plat'Home currently does not accept orders from outside Japan.

sect3.title: Netherlands - 1.6 - J. Rosink (alpha, i386, sparc, macppc)
sect3.para: offers NetBSD bootable CD-ROMs for alpha, i386, sparc and macppc, as well as the 6 CD i386 binary package set.

sect3.title: New Zealand - 1.6.1 - lankum.com
sect3.para: See lankum.com.

sect3.title: Singapore - 1.6.2 - Mynasoft (i386)
sect3.para: Mynasoft offers NetBSD 1.6.2 (binaries, source and packages) on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Spain - 1.6.2 - Compralinux.com
sect3.para: Compralinux.com offers NetBSD 1.6.2 and older version multi-architecture and i386 specific CD-ROMs within Spain.

sect3.title: Spain - 1.6 - Linux-GPL.com
sect3.para: Linux-GPL.com offers NetBSD 1.6 on CD-ROM for the Spanish market. Linux-GPL.com ofrece la última versión de NetBSD para el mercado español.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6.2 - FreeSoftwareCDR
sect3.para: FreeSoftwareCDR offers NetBSD 1.6.2 for Intel at . You can order a full set, including the install CD and 6 package CDs, or a single install CD.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6.1 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: See CheapBytes.

sect3.title: USA - 1.6 - Edmunds Enterprises (i386 only)
sect3.para: See Edmunds Enterprises.

sect3.title: Official - Official NetBSD released CD images
sect3.para: This directory contains one image per port, and they are bootable on those platforms currently supporting CD-ROM booting. The macppc image is bootable on all versions of OpenFirmware.
Also included is a CD set of binary packages compiled for NetBSD/i386. See the README files in the download directory for more information.
The list of NetBSD ISO download sites provides a list of sites worldwide where these official ISO images can be downloaded.

sect3.title: 1.5.x - Multiple architecture images
sect3.para: ftp://ftp.iastate.edu/pub/NetBSD/iso-local/README.html - 1.5 and 1.5.2 multiple architecture bootable ISO images have been made available by Tracy Di Marco White. The README.html file explains what each ISO image contains.

sect3.title: 1.6.1 with KAME - http://openlab.plathome.co.jp/ipv6/index.html
sect3.para: http://openlab.plathome.co.jp/ipv6/index.html - Weekly bootable CD images of NetBSD 1.6.1, 1.5.3 and 1.4.2 with KAME IPv6 implementation.
